"warum gibt es noch immer unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? ich finde es skandalös, dass wir als verbraucher keine kontrolle über unsere eigenen daten haben. #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? i find it outrageous that we as consumers have no control over our own data. #dataprotection #privacy"

explanation: in this post, i'm expressing my frustration about the fact that many companies still collect and sell personal data without proper consent or transparency. i believe that consumers should have more control over their personal information and that companies should be held accountable for protecting our privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are commonly used in germany to discuss these issues on social media.
